text:
Footage of Possession
This video found on 4chan is not for those
with a weak stomach.
Cody published this footage in 2011.

In his description, he writes: “Not much
is known for this footage, other than a family

from Iowa had discovered it in the attic of
their newly bought home.”

This film and some audio recordings were amongst
the findings.

The film shows a very thin and gaunt man as
he lays in bed.
The closet door opens of its own accord.

When the camera turns back to the man in the
bed, he’s not there.
Instead, he’s standing in the corner.

The terrifying clip goes on to show the possessed
man picking at his fingernails, writhing in

bed, moving all over the place, apparently
in agony, with horrible sounds coming from
him.
The video ends shortly after.

It eventually became a popular topic on 4chan’s
/x/ board.
It’s authenticity has been debated eversince.

You Will Never Find Me
This video is a dark disturbing memory that
will haunt you.

uploaded by WAITINGTOPLAY in 2009, it begins
with a cloaked being in the shadows, huddled
over and rocking as though upset.

The red overtones and slightly blurred images
make the clip all the more disturbing.

The next scene shows a man in jeans, a black
jacket, and white gloves walking through a
grassy area.
You only see his torso, not his feet or head.

A couple blurry images appear, maybe from
the dashboard of a vehicle, and then back
to the huddled mass rocking.

Back and forth between these images, and then
the shadowy figure of a person running in
the distance.

The person isn’t just running; he/she appears
to be fleeing something or someone.

In the next scene, ghostly smoke appears in
an alleyway at night, one streetlamp alit
overhead.

Random images of homes, buildings, and brick
appear, interspersed with someone running.

The camera approaches a gate and zooms in
on a building’s window, but it’s hard
to tell what lays in wait inside.

A grassy area near a highway at night and
back to the ghostly smoke under the streetlamp,

where the same man in the jeans, black jacket,
and white gloves walks through the scene.

The man is then seen entering a room, where
a person is sleeping on their back with a
sheet over their face.

The man picks up what appears to be a hammer
and gets close to his/her face with it.

The scene flickers over to the ghostly fog
with the male figure retreating, to the highway,
to the huddled mass, and back.

The man then kneels before the camera, the
victim’s body in the background.

He’s wearing a white mask on his face, and
he lifts a sheet of paper upon which is scrawled
the words, “I killed them.”

He lifts another taunting message, “You’ll
never find me.”

He gets up and leaves, leaving viewers to
wonder what they just watched.

Unknown Lifeform
This North Carolina sewer video was uploaded

by Ryan Morris in 2009, and eventually made
its way to 4chan.

The lifeform looks like the inside of a body,
not the outside of any organism.

It relaxes and contracts, moving in the way
the lungs or heart might.

And it grows like a blob on the walls of the
sewer.

I don’t know what it is, but it certainly
disturbing.
What do you think this unknown lifeform is?
Could it be extraterrestrial?
Maybe.
Many 4channers claimed it’s a type of worm.

Whatever the case, it certainly is a scary
sight.

Hamaca Paranormal
DIARIOFIRMAT TV published this video in 2007.

The video shows a red swing set at a park
on a windy day.

At the beginning of the video, the middle
swing is flying back and forth rapidly, as

though someone is swinging vigorously on it...only
there’s no one near the swingset.

A man then walks in and stops the swing and,
for a moment, it is still, along with the
swings on either side.

They sway a little with the wind, but nothing
like what the middle swing had been doing
moments before.

Then, suddenly, the middle swing starts swinging
back and forth again.
It even starts to twist around a bit.

People are gathered around the swingset, watching
the phenomenon.
What is causing the swing to move?

It is clearly windy, but why are the other
swings just swaying slightly, while this one
is going berserk?

Is a ghost child currently inhabiting that
swing?
Who knows?

While most 4channers argue that the video
is indeed real without the use of special
effects.

It is apparently caused by the resonance phenomenon
which makes this cause more scientific than
paranormal.

No Through Road
“On December 17th 2008 four 17 year old

boys were found [passed away] in their car
at an abandoned farm, 10 miles from their
hometown,” this clip’s description reads.

Published in 2009 by indrancole3, No Through
Road is allegedly the last remaining footage
of the boys alive.

The found footage involves four boys from
Stevenage, Hertfordshire.

According to the clip, the residence near
where these boys were found was thought to
be abandoned.

But when police investigated, it appeared
to have recent inhabitants, maybe squatters.

According to the video, the footage was released
with the parents’ consent in order to garner
any leads in the investigation.

The footage shows your average British teens
out driving around, at around 4 in the morning.

They get lost on the dark back roads and their
GPS has stopped working.

One of the boys gets out of the car, but then
he looks terrified and races back to the passenger’s
seat, screaming, “Drive!”
He claims there was someone wearing a mask.

After driving off again, the boys get in a
fight about where they’re going.

They seem to find their way, and then they
suddenly get lost again and are nearing a

tunnel with signage that says, “Private
Road: No Through Way.”

They stall in the road, wondering what to
do.

Suddenly, there’s a man standing in the
middle of the road in their headlights.
He starts walking towards them.
And the boys don’t live to tell their tale.
But this footage does.

Of course, most of the replies on posts of
this video on the /x/ board mention that this
is a short film.
But that doesn’t make it any less scary.

VHS Tape
Published by Stuart Drake in 2011, the intro

to this video reads: “The following footage
was found on a VHS tape with ‘1999’ scrawled
on it in pen.”

The clip does, in fact, appear as if it was
filmed on an old VHS tape.
It begins outside amongst the trees.

As the camera focuses and scans the area,
you can see white buildings in the background,
fields of green grass, but no people.

It appears that the place is abandoned; at
least, there’s no one around to prove otherwise.

The cameraman approaches an empty somewhat
rundown house, the paint chipped away and
its windows smashed out.

The shot ends and resumes to film another
building with boarded up windows and graffiti
on the walls.

The cameraman’s attention turns to a building
across the way, where he zooms in on a darkened

upper window that has a white curtain blowing
in the breeze.

He films down into a stairwell that appears
to have boxes or garbage at the bottom and
a paper posted on the door.
The video goes haywire for a minute.
Did something just intercept the feed?
What was that?

The cameraman continues on his way, filming
the hay and grass on the ground.

He returns to filming the building, which
is clearly also in disrepair.
He approaches the door of the building.
The glass is broken out of it.

When he turns away from it, the video goes
distorted again, and you can see a vague figure
standing at a distance.

The cameraman seems a little disturbed by
what he assumedly just saw.
He starts hurrying away.
His camera is directed at the ground.

But then suddenly the camera is steady again,
and he’s approaching another open doorway.
He films inside.

There’s no one in the dark corners of the
building.
The film is a bit distorted.

He heads back out and up the stairs, zooming
in on the upper doors.

He wanders further, peering into every corner
of this derelict building.
There are glass bottles on the ground.
But no one is there.
Or so it seems.

The cameraman turns, and there is clearly
a man in a suit standing there, watching him.

The man is caught on film for a brief glimpse,
but then vanishes as the video goes distorted
again and the camera is dropped in alarm.

When it is lifted again to the same spot,
no one is there.

But the cameraman takes this as his cue to
hightail it out of there.
Good call.
That was absolutely chilling.

Some 4channers claim this video is from the
deep web, but we were unable to verify that
claim.

So it appears that this video will remain
a mystery for the time being.

Satan Eating Human
Youtuber peeringthrough published this video

from the 1911 Italian film, L’Inferno to
Youtube in 2008, and it was later picked up

by 4channers and posted to the paranormal
board.

Peeringthrough noted that Satan is seen chowing
down on a human soul in the clip.

While the grainy black-and-white film certainly
looks a bit dated and silly in its animation,

the grotesque monster that is Satan is something
nightmares are made of.

In the scene, two small humans are walking
in the inferno, which appears to be littered

with boulders - or perhaps those are skeletons
and/or other souls lost to Satan.

Satan appears to have batlike wings, which
move slightly while he eats the human gluttonously.

From afar, you can see legs sticking out of
his mouth, while the two small characters
approach.

And then, suddenly, the dark figure grabs
hold of the one dressed in grey in what appears

to be an embrace, but perhaps is something
more sinister, considering the context.

The grey character seems to be strangled and
dragged toward Satan, likely for his next
meal.

The video moves in closer, and there is indeed
a human body half eaten, the legs and arms

still moving, as Satan raises his eyebrows
up and down, while gnarling his hands near
his face.

Although this film does look very dated, the
grotesque imagery reminds some of the Disney
movie Fantasia.

While the creators of this film are likely
long passed away, the fear of Satan is still
very much alive in their film.

Propagation6
Uploaded in 2009 by jojacob666, Propagation6

begins with the black and white image of a
smoking skull.

There are images of wandering outside during
fall through dead leaves interspersed with
images of a man drinking.

The man is dressed in black with black rings
around his eyes and a thick chain around his
neck.

Music in the background sets the spine a-tingling,
while the wandering continues, this time inside.
A door is opening.
The man sits there.
A masked man enters in a hood.
His mask is grotesque and monstrous.

The guy with the rings around his eyes is
sitting in the corner of a room, huddled over.
The masked man approaches with a knife.

The man then turns the blade around and hands
the knife to the other man.

The ring-eyed man’s face is suddenly painted
like a skull.
He is holding the blade to his face.

An image of a blank mask appears and then
a man with a blank white face leaves, and
the skull sits smoking on the table.

This clip is eerily reminiscent of the video
“You Will Never Find Me,” and it’s hard

to tell what it means...if it means anything
at all.

Haunted Hospital
Robert Simpson uploaded this video in 2008.

The video begins with a smiling reporter,
her eyes blocked out.

“There is a story behind this video,”
the text reads.

“They say that this footage has driven many
of its viewers to insanity and even compelled
some to take their own lives.”
The footage shown reveals a woman in the darkness.

She screams out, and as the footage is slowed
down, you can see the haunting image of a

distant figure standing in the reflection
of a mirror.

The documentarian says that it’s a “female
nurse-like figure.”

The footage is said to have been uploaded
to the web and soon generated some interest.

Some claimed that if you saw “the red thing,”
you’d go insane.

What red thing were these viewers speaking
of?

And if they’d seen it, why weren’t they
insane?

After searching the footage meticulously,
the documentarian couldn’t find it.

He didn’t even know what the footage was
but suspected that it was shot by a local
TV station.

After making some calls, he wasn’t given
any clear answer, so he visited the address
where the footage was shot.

He met a man who was injured at the abandoned
hospital.

When asked if he could remember anything,
the man became physically ill.

The documentarian did find out that the woman
in the footage was a reporter.

Not an in-house reporter, but an actress from
a talent agency.

She’d disappeared from her agency’s webpage,
but the documentarian uncovered her obituary.

The “female talent” was said to have fallen
to her fate.
Or she jumped.
Right after making this report.

He then called the director of the TV station,
who had left four years prior to this investigation.

He videotaped their meeting with a hidden
camera.

After asking if there is a red object in the
footage, the silent director hands the documentarian
something and says, “You can have it.”
Then he quickly leaves.

The something was a videotape, which allegedly
shows the original program in its entirety.

In the footage, the woman screams, as before,
and then says she saw someone.

The cameraman starts walking through the dark
rooms and hallway, with a flashlight directed
ahead.

They search the whole place in the dark, with
only a flashlight beam to guide them.

The camera films a darkened room, which appears
empty, and then on the opposite wall, he films

a mirror which shows there’s at least two
people in that room.
He returns and the room is empty again.
Back to the mirror, it’s occupied.

Then as it pulls forward in a panic, the footage
captures a glimpse of a creature on the floor.
And that’s the end of the Haunted Hospital.

While I’m guessing most of the people on
the 4chan post of this clip have not died

after seeing the red thing (or because of
it), I certainly don’t want to see it again.

The investigation was well done, and it brings
up some questions that need answers.

Time Displacement
This time displacement experimental video

was uploaded by youtuber Matteo Ricchetti
in 2006.
In the description, he simply writes, “Distortions.”

In the slightly blurry black-and-white video,
a dark-haired woman turns slowly, while her

limbs and torso twist and turn on their own
time.

The music playing in the background is reminiscent
of a child’s music box.

As she twirls, her distorted body returns
to normal, while she stands facing forward.
Then, suddenly, the screen is entirely black.

It’s an amazing visual, albeit incredibly
creepy and somewhat upsetting.

The visuals and that music are mesmerizing
and will be stuck in your mind forevermore.

Agamemnon Counterpart
Youtuber fividtelefuzzerator uploaded this
video in 2006.

The intro to Agamemnon Counterpart reads:
“In the year 2571, a videocassette tape

was found in a pile of rubble on a certain
blue planet.

What you are about to witness will not be
the contents of the aforementioned cassette
tape.”

As the video notes, this recording has nothing
to do with that cassette tape, and everything

to do with scaring the wits out of adults
and children.

You see, the video is a cartoon with two monster
creatures, one appearing to be a frog, and

the words above demanding, “Let’s make
a new friend.”

The two creatures are talking to each other
- one saying “A”, the other saying “O”.

Then suddenly the frog-like creature’s speech
bubble goes static and the screen changes

to a whole other cartoon, altogether, with
a close up of a male cartoon head without
eyes.

Only the mouth is moving, while treacherous
screaming and groovy music carry on in the
background.

The frog-like creature reappears, and its
head blows up into the sun, growing and floating

up towards the sky, while its body remains
below.

Flickering between various images, the background
music and laughing continues.

The visuals combined with the audio are enough
to make anyone nauseous.

Lost Keys
Published in 2014 by tsalal023, is a scary

black and white video with lots of flashing
lights, screechy head splintering noise, and

a person in a bunny mask, twirling around
and dancing.

It doesn’t seem to have anything to do with
lost keys.

The person in the bunny mask starts walking
up the stairs backwards.

The clip then shows a picture of an unknown
symbol, which in fact does look like a key
and then the screen goes black.

Maybe the key to understanding this video
is in figuring out what that symbol means...

Anonymous Satan Song
John Cartwright published this video via 4chan’s
paranormal board in 2010.

The clip is nothing but music with a Satanic
looking still frame as its background.

The creepy music begins with a high pitched
beep with some underlying scratchy tones.

Then a louder buzzing comes in, like the approach
of a subway car.

It crescendos into loud scratchy music that
turns into an accordion-like sound.

The music sounds like something that would
be played in an old silent film when the villain

enters the scene; only, it’s overlaid with
intense scratchy sounds that distort it somewhat.

Seriously, it’s like the soundtrack to a
scene where the bad guy ties up the damsel
in distress on the railroad tracks.

But towards the end of the clip, the accordion
music simply stops, leaving the high pitched

ringing, scratchy distortion, and later what
sounds like a heart pounding.

While I’m not entirely sure if this song
is Satanic, perhaps listening to it a few
times is an bad omen.

At the very least, you may end up with a splitting
headache.

Body of a Pig
The name of this video, alone, is creepy.
And then you watch it.

In this scary video found on 4Chan’s paranormal
board, the youtuber devinraymond claims that

the EVP was obtained through a group he was
once employed by.

In his summary, he declares: “Truly frightening
EVP recorded in a secret location during my

tenure as special guest and resident expert
with a group that I cannot name.

My association with the group ended due to
reasons I cannot legally disclose.”

In the video, the ghost hunters are walking
toward a red door, in which the cameraman
suggests there “might be a body.”

According to devinraymond, they were investigating
a reported haunted location.

The red door is surrounded by brick in what
appears to be a dank, dark hallway.

As the cameraman opens the door, you hear
corrupted audio that the uploader claims says,

“I have the body of a pig,” followed by
a pig’s grunt.

The uploader also claims that no one heard
the sound at the time of the filming, and

it was only discovered after the man studied
the footage.

But when they opened the red door, there was
nothing out of the ordinary behind it.
Or was there...

Purportedly, there was also a photograph taken
at that very moment.

Upon close inspection, within the dirt and
hay in the crawl space behind the door, appears

a man-beast of some kind, crawling out from
the darkness.
Perhaps with the body of a pig.
Was this the demon ghost haunting the place?
If so, it’s time to get out of there.

Before we get to number 1, my name is Chills
and I hope you’re enjoying my narration.

If you’re curious about what I look like
in real life, then go to my instagram, @dylan_is_chillin_yt
and tap that follow button to find out.

I’m currently doing a super poll on my Instagram,
if you believe ghosts are real, then go to
my most recent photo, and tap the like button.
If you don’t, DM me saying why.

When you’re done come right back to this
video to find out the number 1 entry.

Chills Merch is now available and I’m gifting
viewers who spend over $100 with a 100% free
“foot lettuce” t-shirt to show my appreciation.

This offer won’t last forever so get yours
by visiting chillsmerch.com.

Also follow me on Twitter @YT_Chills because
that’s where I post video updates.

It's a proven fact that generosity makes you
a happier person, so if you're generous enough

to hit that subscribe button and the bell
beside it then thank you.

This way you'll be notified of the new videos
we upload every Tuesday and Saturday.

Lisa’s 911 Phone Call
This is the most disturbing videos on this

list, because it is the recording of a real-life
event.

In Lisa’s 911 phone call, uploaded by UtopianDweller
in 2009 and posted to 4chan’s Paranormal

Board, you hear the 911 phone call of a six-year-old
girl, according to the video’s description.
The phone call is hard to listen to.

In it, the young girl details the situation
that’s currently unfolding in her home.
You can hear a baby crying in the background.
The girl keeps yelling at her stepdad to stop.

From the way she is handling the call, it
almost seems like she’s had to call the
police before on her stepdad.

In fact, the SF Globe writes, in a report
on Lisa Floyd years later: “She said she

called the police hundreds of times when she
was a young girl, and Child Protective Service

(CPS) workers came out to her house at least
twenty-three times.”

“This has been going on forever and ever,”
she says.
The monster is hurting her mother.

The girl then says that her stepdad just knocked
her sister out, who is four-year-old . The

phone call ends with the girl crying out that
her stepdad has the baby now.

This horrific audio is enough to put the listener
in a state of panic and distress.

Thankfully, Lisa Floyd, the girl in the video
made it out alive, along with her mom and
siblings.
